item.title: Theme Documentation - Basics
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Discover what the Hugo - KeepIt theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Extended Shortcodes
item.author: Dillon
item.description: KeepIt theme provides multiple shortcodes on top of built-in ones in Hugo.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.author: Dillon
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

item.title: Theme Documentation - mermaid Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The mermaid shortcode supports diagrams in Hugo with Mermaid library.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Theme Documentation - echarts Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The echarts shortcode supports data visualization in Hugo with ECharts library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - mapbox Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The mapbox shortcode supports interactive maps in Hugo with Mapbox GL JS library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - music Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The music shortcode embeds a responsive music player based on APlayer and MetingJS .

item.title: Theme Documentation - bilibili Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The bilibili shortcode embeds a responsive video player for bilibili videos.

item.title: Embracing Creativity: My Journey Begins
item.author: Ray
item.description: Welcome to my first blog post! Today marks the beginning of a new chapter in my life, where I will share my thoughts, experiences, and creative endeavors with you. As a passionate individual who thrives on expressing ideas through various mediums, I believe that storytelling is at the heart of every creative journey.
